name: awesome-llm-skills (Prat011)
description: [项目级] A curated list of awesome LLM and AI Agent Skills, resources and tools for customising AI Agent workflows - that works with Claude Code, Codex, Gemini CLI and your custom AI Agents。来源: https://github.com/Prat011/awesome-llm-skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A curated list of awesome LLM and AI Agent Skills, resources and tools for customising AI Agent workflows - that works with Claude Code, Codex, Gemini CLI and your custom AI Agents

来源: https://github.com/Prat011/awesome-llm-skills
语言: Python
Stars: 910

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
---
  name: my-skill-name
  description: A clear description of what this skill does and when to use it.
  ---
  
  # My Skill Name
  
  Detailed description of the skill's purpose and capabilities.
  
  ## When to Use This Skill
  
  - Use case 1
  - Use case 2
  - Use case 3
  
  ## Instructions
  
  [Detailed instructions for LLMs on how to execute this skill]
  
  ## Examples
  
  [Real-world examples showing the skill in action]
